channel.title: How to take away the save button?
channel.description: hey guys im trying to take out the save button in my quest tab do you guys know how? if so it would be greatly appreciated if you told me how! thanks :rolleyes:

item.title: How to take away the save button?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Search for clickingbuttons.java and then look for save game… Change it to like… We Hope You Stay… So they dont know its save game
I think i got a part wrong… but if i do - tell me!

Read full topic
item.source: How to take away the save button?

item.title: How to take away the save button?
item.dc:creator: @king_eod king eod
item.description:
@king_eod wrote:

Simple solution,
first find the clickbutton id of when you click it if your using pi it should say something like click in the cmd
then search for the id of the clicked button
next remove it
finally voila!

Read full topic

item.title: How to take away the save button?
item.description:
@308507631 wrote:

Go into Client.java, and search for “save button” or whatever yours says, and remove it, save, and compile. Done.
Obviously if you see the “save button” near like other stuff, such as, your player name, “items kept on death” etc, you’d know that’s the one.

Read full topic
